overview: The mission was impossible. The Odds were astronomical.  The results were spectacular.  NOVA presents the fascinating story behind the Apollo space program, including the most remarkable feat in human history - the historic walk on the moon in 1969.  Meet the unsung heroes, experience the dangers and discover a broader range of Apollo perspectives than any space documentary ever produced.
tagline: Danger, Drama & Daring: The inside story behind "One Giant Leap"
title: NOVA: To The Moon
